description.value:
You unleash a small, localized tremor in a @Template[type:burst|distance:10] within 30 feet. Each creature in the area takes @Damage[(1d8+(floor((@actor.level -1)/2))d10)[bludgeoning]|traits:area-damage] damage with a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classDC.value)|basic:true] save against your class DC. A creature that critically fails is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone]. Earth and stone in the area is difficult terrain until the start of your next turn.

Level (+2) The damage increases by 1d10.
